title: WTB: graded T206 brown hindu's and graded T216's
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB: graded T206 brown hindu's and graded T216's
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
T206 Brown Hindu backs.

T216's.  Kotton and Virginia Extra Backs.  Looking for a Type 2 Kotton back in particular.

SGC or PSA graded only.  I want nice eye appeal.  Up to SGC 50, PSA 4 and down to SGC 10, PSA 1.

I can send a check or pay via paypal if we agree.

If you have something, please email me with your asking price and scans of the front and back of each card.  

Email: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

Thanks in advance.
